title: Three Handed Economist: Interior Solutions in an Ideologically Cornered World
description: The world has enough sectarian problems and we need inspired solutions, not ideological entrenchment. Ideology serves only to limit choice, and by reducing choices growth stimulating accords are sometimes overlooked or simply ignored. Three Handed Economist explains the various sides of each problem, introduces data and analysis, and helps readers escape ideologically cornered motivations in favor of practical, real-world solutions.
author: Mark Flowers
